Source code for lung_cancer.dataset.dataset.models.base

""" Contains a base model class"""


[docs]class BaseModel:
    """ Base model """
    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
        self.config = kwargs.get('config', {})
        self.name = kwargs.get('name', None) or self.__class__.__name__
        if self.get_from_config('build', True):
            self.build(*args, **kwargs)
        if self.get_from_config('load', False):
            self.load(**self.config)


[docs]    def get_from_config(self, variable, default=None):
        """ Return a variable from config or a default value """
        return self.config.get(variable, default)



[docs]    def build(self, *args, **kwargs):
        """ Define the model """
        _ = self, args, kwargs



[docs]    def load(self, *args, **kwargs):
        """ Load the model """
        _ = self, args, kwargs



[docs]    def save(self, *args, **kwargs):
        """ Save the model """
        _ = self, args, kwargs



[docs]    def train(self, *args, **kwargs):
        """ Train the model """
        _ = self, args, kwargs



[docs]    def predict(self, *args, **kwargs):
        """ Make a prediction using the model  """
        _ = self, args, kwargs
